title: Kyrie Irving Is Not Antisemitic, Says NBA Commissioner Adam Silver
description: Irving, the Nets guard, met with Silver this week after promoting an antisemitic film on social media last month. Silver said Irvingâ€™s actions were damaging.

media:description: N.B.A. Commissioner Adam Silver spoke at a sports business conference in Washington on Thursday.
